name: 茂伸奇谈 / Monobeno
description: This was a story about humans and monsters, disease and haunting, and the past and the future. It leads you to the unusual traditional Japanese culture.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Core2Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256M Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: PCM
